subject: Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Suits and Litigation
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After the Mets’ settlement with Irving H. Picard, the trustee for Bernard L. Madoff’s victims, Mr. Picard can help the team by recouping up to $178 million for the club from so-called net winners.
snippet: After the Mets’ settlement with Irving H. Picard, the trustee for Bernard L. Madoff’s victims, Mr. Picard can help the team by recouping up to $178 million for the club from so-called net winners.
